name: Abyss: Rebirth Phantom
description:
◈ Enjoy the Idle game X RPG X Cute girls(Bishojyo) at once!
You don't have to play for a long time. Even if you do not play directly, girls will keep fighting for you in the game. Lead the cute girls with your own strategy.

◈ A story of adventure in another world with cute girls!
One day, your soul suddenly transfers to the Abyss and you meet an angel there...
We invite you on an adventure of love and friendship that crosses the world. An idle RPG game with an exciting story created with charming beautiful girl characters.

◈ Abyss is recommended for players who :
- wants to enjoy for free.
- searching for a game with a wonderful story.
- wants a game full of pretty illustrations of cute girls (Bishojyo game).
- wants to enjoy an exciting adventure.
- don't have enough time to play RPG.
- tired of complex RPG games.
- wants light, killing-time game.
